host.title: Meet Your Host
host.name: Junie (Thanh Nhan Pham)
host.story:
I was born in Hanoi, Vietnam and came to Korea with my dreams. I studied Social Welfare at Seojeong University and was active in student council.

I still remember how lonely and lost I felt when I first arrived in Korea. I couldn't speak the language, and everything was unfamiliar. That's why I started V-HOUSE - to be a 'Vietnamese home in Korea' for those who are new here, just like I was.

Let me help make your trip to Korea a warm memory!
